name: CanRun Universal Game Compatibility Checker
description: Check game compatibility and performance predictions for your NVIDIA RTX/GTX system. Get instant answers about whether games will run, expected FPS, and optimization recommendations.
author: CanRun Development Team

functions.name: check_compatibility
functions.description: Check game compatibility with current system

parameters.name: game_name
parameters.description: Name of the game to check

functions.name: predict_performance
functions.description: Predict game performance for specific settings

functions.name: get_optimization_suggestions
functions.description: Get optimization recommendations for a game
